about_the_game:
The Way You Died is a mistery/puzzle game where you role play a medical examiner trying to understand how a person died.

Whenever there is a suspect death we need someone to understand how a person died. Was it a murder ? A suicide ? Only you can figure out what happened.

In this demo you'll be playing one of the 10 to 15 levels the game will offer on release. Good luck!

content_descriptors.notes: This game will talk about (likely unusual) death of some people. Some stories will include murder, suicide and accidents that might shock some audiance.
